description:
The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to two times the inverse (-2x) of the daily performance of the MSCI Brazil 25/50 Index®.
 The fund invests in financial instruments that ProShare Advisors believes, in combination, should produce daily returns consistent with the fund's investment objective. The index is a free-float-adjusted, market capitalization-weighted index that is designed to measure the equity market performance of the Brazilian market. The fund is non-diversified.
